attributes.action: Let people from the age of 16 vote in the EU referendum.
attributes.additional_details: Any repercussions of the decision made will change the way our country runs and how we live our everyday lives. I believe that anyone who will be impacted by this should have a say in what happens. For example if we vote to leave and as a result the economy collapses, we are the people who will have to deal with that and have to adapt drastically to it.
attributes.background: The issue of whether we leave or stay in the EU is one that will have an impact on the lives of the younger generation as well as older generations. I think the fact that we are all going to live in a world effected by this decision gives people from age 16 the right to vote.
